author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Conviviality ‍Confirms In Discussions With C&C In Respect Of Possible Sale Of Conviviality Direct Business​
text:
April 4 (Reuters) - Conviviality PLC:
* ‍COMPANY CONFIRMS IT IS IN DISCUSSIONS WITH C&C IN RESPECT OF A POSSIBLE SALE TO C&C OF CONVIVIALITY DIRECT BUSINESS​
* ALSO IN DISCUSSIONS WITH A NUMBER OF OTHER PARTIES INTERESTED IN PURCHASE OF RETAIL BUSINESS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
